layout.label: Title
layout.description: The title of the file object.

layout.label: Identifier
layout.description: A unique identifier for the file object.

layout.label: Creator
layout.description: The main researchers involved in producing the data, or the authors of the publication, in priority order. For instruments this is the manufacturer or developer of the instrument. To supply multiple creators, repeat this property.

creator.label: Creator
creator.description: The main researchers involved in producing the data, or the authors of the publication, in priority order. For instruments this is the manufacturer or developer of the instrument. To supply multiple creators, repeat this property.

input.label: Name
input.description: The full name of the creator. Format: Family name, Given names..

nameIdentifier.label: Name Identifier
nameIdentifier.description: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

input.label: Name Identifier
input.description: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity, according to various schemes.

input.label: Name Identifier Scheme
input.description: The name of the name identifier scheme.

input.label: Scheme URI
input.description: The URI of the name identifier scheme.

input.label: Affiliation
input.description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator.

input.label: Affiliation Identifier
input.description: Uniquely identifies the organizational affiliation of the creator.

input.label: Affiliation Identifier Scheme
input.description: The name of the affiliation identifier scheme.

input.label: Affiliation Scheme URI
input.description: The URI of the affiliation identifier scheme.
